Package model

package model
  • Class
    Description
    AnimationPanel
    the panel in which an animation is used
    AudioManager
    The class responsible to handle the audio of the project
    Carta
    The class that represents a playing card
    ChooseNicknameView
     
    CPU
    the CPU class which is a subclass of genericPlayer
    FinalFrame
    the final frame shown after winning or losing the trash game.
    Game
    The game class which handles everything related to the Trash game
    GameController
    Controller which handles the game class and view, as per the MVC pattern
    GameView
    the game view class that shows everything related to the game to the user
    GenericPlayer
    class that represents a generic player
    Giocatore
    class of the player used by the user
    IntermediateWindow
    window that shows up to input the amount of players in a game
    MainMenuView
    class of the main menu frame
    Mazzo
    deck class
    Observer
    observer interface for Observer pattern
    ProfileController
    controllr of the profile, connects model and view as per MVC
    ProfileView
    view of the profile
    SemeCarta
    the suit of the card
    StartUpIDFrame
    the first frame shown to the user where you input the id
    Subject
    the subject interface of the Observer pattern
    Utente
    user class that holds all the relevant information
    ValoreCarta
    enumeration that represents the value of a card
